H1.text: what are the 7 countries that are part of central america. Costa Rica

H2.text: what are the 7 countries that are part of central america. El Salvador

H3.text: what are the 7 countries that are part of central america. Panama

A4.text: Central America is usually defined as consisting of seven countries: Belize, Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua, and Panama.

A5.text: In 1838, Costa Rica, Guatemala, Honduras, and Nicaragua became the first of Central America's seven states to become independent countries, followed by El Salvador in 1841, Panama in 1903, and Belize in 1981.
